name: Smearthquake
description:
Money can't buy happiness.

But it can buy action figures, posters, paintings and a bunch of other stuff (mostly cubes) and I've never seen a man owning all these things unhappy. And remember: never leave your things unattended, especially during an earthquake, that's when they need you the most!

Keep doing your job typing the words that appear on the screen, earn money which you can spend in the shop, because things prevent you from being sad.

I don't want to seem obvious, but you can put your posters and paintings on the wall, but if you leave a precious rubik's cube mid-air it will fall, duh?

Commands:

Mouse: Can interact with the computer interface and drags objects aroud,

Keyboard: You can write with it.

Esc/Enter: Pauses the game

Tab: Switches between work and shop.

During an earthquake your objects become more and more unstable, until they fall down, you can simply click on them to make them stay put.

We hope you'll have fun and get all the references!

Made by: Will-14M and Aisja (www.instagram.com/_aisja_/) for the LÖVE JAM 2022 (https://itch.io/jam/love2d-jam-2022)
